Question: Often times, when introducing a toxin at the lowest trophic level, it is the top-level carnivores that are the most negatively affected. This exhibits a phenomenon known as...

Which of the following is/are (a) function(s) of the smooth endoplasmic reticulum? Select all that apply.
What important function does lactic acid fermentation execute when oxygen is not available?
Option 1: Oxygen is produced from breaking down pyruvate
Option 3: It maintains an \(H^+\) proton gradient in the mitochondrion intermembrane space
Option 4: It maintains an \(H^+\) proton gradient within the thylakoid space
Option 5: \(ATP\) is produced from the breakdown of pyruvate into lactate

Question: In which phase of meiosis are pairs of homologous chromosomes lined up on the metaphase plate?

Kobonozom (I made up that word) is a rare, X-linked dominant disorder. A male with Kobonozom marries a female without Kobonozom. Which of the following will be true of their children? Select two options.
Option 1: Each of their male children has a 50% chance of having Kobonozom
Option 2: None of their male children will have Kobonozom
Option 3: All of their female children will have Kobonozom
Option 4: None of their female children will have Kobonozom

Question: Tryptophan, the product of a chemical reaction, can allosterically bind to a repressor protein, activating it and blocking transcription of an enzyme that catalyzes that reaction. Tryptophan, in this case, is a(n)...
In the process of gel electrophoresis, after DNA fragments are put into the well, what happens?
Option 1: The smaller fragments move toward the positive end; the larger fragments move toward the negative end
Option 2: The smaller fragments move toward the negative end; the larger fragments move toward the positive end
Option 3: All fragments move toward the positive end; the smaller fragments travel farther
Option 4: All fragments move toward the negative end; the larger fragments travel farther
Option 5: All fragments move toward the negative end; the smaller fragments travel farther
